Classes
Signal Namespace Reference

Namespace for POSIX Signal events and handlers. More...

Classes

class  Event
 Class for sending Signal events (see Handler for an example) More...
 
class  EventPhy
 Class for bridging physical events with Signal events. More...
 
class  Handler
 Class for handling Signal events. More...
 

Detailed Description

The classes in this namespace can be used to send signals (see Event) to other processes as well as setup handlers (see Handler) when signals are received. The handlers can also be set up to handle system signals generated by the hardware (see EventPhy).
